schema.name: Soy, ginger, sesame Tofu Marinade
schema.keywords: mealprep, veganuary2026, tofumarinade, plantbasedrecipes, easyveganrecipes, tofu, marinade, soy, ginger, sesame
schema.description: An easy tofu marinade with soy, ginger, and sesame, along with cooking instructions for fried or air-fried tofu.

recipeInstructions.text: Press 400 to 450g extra firm tofu to remove excess water, then cut into desired pieces.
Combine 60 ml soy sauce, 30 ml rice vinegar, 15 ml sesame oil, 15 ml maple syrup, 1 tbsp grated ginger, and 2 garlic cloves to create the marinade.
Marinate the tofu in the mixture for a minimum of 20 minutes; longer is better for flavor.
Cook the marinated tofu by air frying at 180¬∞C for 12 to 15 minutes, or pan frying on medium high until golden.

recipeInstructions.text: Cocinar en el horno durante 45 minutos a 190¬∞C, o en freidora de aire durante 30 minutos a 190¬∞C.
Acompa√±ar con carbohidratos como Salma, quinoa o arroz integral para una comida con macros completos.

schema.name: Gluten-Free Baklava
schema.description: Baklava has always been one of our top-tier desserts in Bulgaria that I would only eat on special occasions because one bite would send me into the best sugar coma for dayssss üòµ‚Äçüí´. But when I began my weight loss journey I vowed to myself that I wouldn‚Äôt miss out on delicious desserts just because I‚Äôm in a calorie deficit. Well, call me Sneji, the calorie slayer ü§æ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è (my fellow millennials will get this reference üòâ), because I managed to make this Balkan classic into a macro friendly, dairy-free, celiac-friendly, gluten-free work of crunchy art.

recipeInstructions.text: Full recipe instructions available on https://themodernnonna.com/gluten-free-baklava/

schema.name: Persimmon Pomegranate Arugula Salad (NEEDS RE-SCRAPE)
schema.keywords: Christmas salad recipe,persimmon pomegranate arugula salad,vegan Christmas recipes,gluten-free salad,refined sugar-free salad,cinnamon maple dressing,easy salad recipes,healthy Christmas recipes,persimmon recipes,arugula salad,salad recipes for Christmas,holiday salad ideas,Christmas cooking,vegan cooking,gluten-free cooking
schema.description: Create a stunning and delicious Christmas salad with this persimmon pomegranate arugula recipe. Perfect for a quick and easy meal, this salad features the sweetness of persimmons, the peppery flavor of arugula, and the crunch of nuts and seeds. The easy cinnamon maple dressing ties everything together. Make it a part of your holiday feast and enjoy the flavors of the season. Get the recipe now and make it a Christmas to remember! #christmassalad #saladrecipe #veganrecipes #glutenfree #healthyfood

schema.name: Smoky Sausage Stew
schema.description: Sharing some of my most-loved recipes from ‚Äô25 ‚ú®ü©∑ A perfect way to get some January food inspo ü§© my smoky sausage stew, a comforting classic with a zesty pesto twist that honestly makes this dish SO good! Save this for your next cosy night in! ü•Ñüíõ

recipeInstructions.text: Finely slice the red onion, red pepper and crush the garlic - set aside. Thinly slice the chorizo and fry in a hot pan until crispy and releasing its oils. Remove the chorizo and set aside, leaving the oil in the pan.
Add the onion, red pepper and garlic to the pan and saut√© until soft and fragrant. Meanwhile, pan fry or air fry the sausages until golden and cooked through.
Stir the tomato pur√©e, mixed herbs and paprika into the pan. Pour in the chicken stock and tinned tomatoes, stir and cook for a minute.
Add the drained beans and return the chorizo to the pan. Simmer over low‚Äìmedium heat while the sausages finish cooking.
Add the spinach a handful at a time until wilted, then season to taste. Spoon the stew into bowls and top with the sausages. Drizzle over some fresh pesto, natural yogurt and chilli flakes.

schema.name: 20 Minute Honey Soy Tofu + Miso Broth + Rice + Crispy Ginger
recipeIngredient: 125g (uncooked weight) rice of choice, I used sushi rice
2-3 inches ginger, peeled & julienned as evenly as possible
2 tbsp honey (agave or maple syrup for vegan)
Greens - tenderstem broccoli or pak choi would be good in blanched in the broth for a few mins

recipeInstructions.text: Cook rice | Cook the rice according to your preferred method
Make broth | Add the miso, stock, soy sauce, sugar to a saucepan and combine | Pour in the stock and bring to a simmer until the miso has dissolved | Taste and adjust the seasoning accordingly

Cook ginger | Heat a generous drizzle of oil in a frying pan over a medium heat | Add the julienned ginger and cook for 5-6 minutes or until the ginger has turned golden brown and a crispy | Remove the ginger from the pan, reserving the oil | If there‚Äôs too much oil still in the pan then discard some

Cook tofu | Increase the heat of the pan to medium high | Add the tofu and a generous pinch of salt and cook for 8-10 minutes until golden | Stir in the soy sauce and honey and cook for a few minutes until thickened and glossy | Taste and add more soy, honey or salt if needed
Serve | Portion the rice into bowls, pour over the broth, top with the tofu, crispy ginger and garnish with the spring onions and togarashi

schema.name: Coconut Thai Chicken Meatballs
schema.keywords: Mid week meals, 20 minute meals, family meals, autumn food, dinner ideas, easy dinner ideas, one pot meals, one pan meals, thai curry
schema.description: A recipe that is not too spicy but has that little bit of a kick to warm you through as this weather starts to get colder.
recipeIngredient: 1 small courgette grated (squeeze out as much liquid as you can)

recipeInstructions.text: To a bowl add all of the meatball ingredients and mix well together.
Split the mixture in to 12 and form in meatballs.
Cook off in pan on a medium heat for 10 mins.
Remove from the pan & set to one side.
To the same pan add the peppers & fry off for 5 mins.
Add in the rest of the sauce ingredients, mix well and leave to simmer on a medium heat for 10 mins.
Add the meatballs back in to the pan, reduce the heat to low and allow to simmer for a future 10 mins until the sauce has started to thicken.
Serve with rice & veg for a gorgeous warming winter meal!

schema.name: Cinnamon Toast (Grace Elkus Bianconi's Twist)
schema.description: A twist on classic cinnamon toast, made more substantial with whipped cottage cheese.

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together all the cinnamon-sugar ingredients.
Whip the cottage cheese in a mini food processor until creamy.
Combine the whipped cottage cheese, vanilla, and half the cinnamon-sugar.
Toast the bread, spread with butter (if desired), then spread the whipped cottage cheese onto the bread, going all the way to the edges. Sprinkle with the remaining cinnamon-sugar.
Air fry at 400¬∞F until bubbling and starting to brown, about 5 minutes. (Or use toaster oven or broiler). Enjoy with fresh fruit!

schema.name: Spiced Salmon with Lemon-Dill Cream Sauce & Orzo
schema.keywords: Spiced Salmon, Lemon-Dill Cream Sauce, Orzo, mediterraneandiet, salmonrecipe, weeknightdinner, healthycomfortfood
schema.description: A 20-minute dinner that tastes straight out of a restaurant‚Äîtender spiced salmon, silky lemon-dill cream sauce, and cozy orzo all in one plate

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer the orzo in chicken broth until tender. Drain if needed, stir in butter or olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.

Rub the salmon with olive oil, smoked paprika, cayenne, oregano, salt, pepper, and lemon zest. Pan-sear skin-side down over high heat for 3‚Äì4 minutes. Flip, reduce heat to medium, and cook another 2‚Äì4 minutes depending on thickness. Set aside.

For the sauce, melt butter in the same pan. Add shallot and cook 2‚Äì3 minutes until soft. Add garlic and cook 30 seconds until fragrant. Pour in white wine and reduce by half. Add cream and simmer 5‚Äì7 minutes until thick and glossy. Stir in lemon zest, lemon juice, dill, salt, pepper, and chili flakes to taste.
Serve the orzo on plates, spoon the warm lemon-dill sauce over, then top with the salmon. Finish with extra dill.

schema.name: Quick & Juicy Frittata Wrap
schema.description: Quick & Juicy Frittata Wrap

recipeInstructions.text: Prep: Line an ovenproof dish with lavash. Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Layer: Pour egg mix over lavash. Top with veggies and bacon.
Bake: At 180¬∞C (350¬∞F) for 20-25 mins until eggs set.
Cheese it up: Sprinkle mozzarella, bake until golden (2-3 mins).

schema.name: Sobremesa de Natal
schema.keywords: Sobremesa de Natal, emagrecimento, dieta, treino, receita, receitafit
schema.description: Healthy and easy Christmas dessert recipe with Greek yogurt, skimmed milk powder, strawberries, and dark chocolate.
recipeIngredient: 1 colher de sopa de leite em p√≥ desnatado

recipeInstructions.text: Para a base, misturar 1 potinho de iogurte com o leite em p√≥ desnatado e os morangos.
Para a parte de cima, misturar o outro pote de iogurte e o chocolate amargo derretido.
Colocar na travessa por cima da base.
Levar √† geladeira por 40 minutos.

schema.name: Caramelized Onion Puff Pastry Twists
schema.keywords: caramelized onion puff pastry twists,holiday appetizer recipe,easy puff pastry recipe,puff pastry appetizer,cheesy puff pastry,caramelized onion recipe,holiday party food,puff pastry rolls,gourmet appetizer,make ahead appetizer,party food ideas,easy entertaining,special occasion recipes,dinner party recipes,easy recipes,holiday recipes,puff pastry recipes,caramelized onion recipes,cheesy recipes,appetizer recipes,gourmet recipes
schema.description: Caramelized Onion Puff Pastry Twists are an easy holiday appetizer loaded with flavor. Using puff pastry, onions, and cheese, this simple recipe is a game-changer for your next dinner party. Learn how to make caramelized onion puff pastry twists with just a few ingredients and some simple steps.

recipeInstructions.text: Saut√© the onions in ghee and season with salt, pepper, maple syrup, and rosemary.
Place the cheese on half of the pastry and top with the onions.
Roll up as shown in the video and brush with egg.
Bake in the oven at 390¬∞F (200¬∞C) for about 20 minutes.

schema.name: Chicken Caesar Salad Chalupas
schema.description: My high protein chalupa series has been super viral and I think I might‚Äôve the best one yet!

recipeInstructions.text: Take your chicken breast and pat dry with a paper towel. Then flatten. I just use my fist lol.
Then season both sides with seasoning mix recipe above. Air fry on 400 degrees F for 9-10 minutes.
While that‚Äôs cooking, make your caesar dressing by adding all your ingredients into a bowl and mixing.
Now chop up your chicken breast once done and add to a bowl. Combine with the buffalo caesar dressing 1/6th caesar dressing.
Chop up 300g romaine and add 1/6th caesar dressing to it. Can add more but we don‚Äôt want the romaine to be soggy.
Now put together your chalupas. Lay one pita down then add to on side 6g mozzarella, 2g parmesan, 1/4th of your chicken caesar dip, 2g parmesan, 6g mozzarella.

Fold your chalupa tightly. Spray both sides with cooking spray and add to air fryer on 400 degrees F for 4 minutes. I added some ramekins on top of each one to make sure they stayed closed while in the air fryer.
Once done, open them up, add your caesar salad and enjoy!

schema.name: Honey Butter Tofu Crumble
schema.description: You can make this in the oven or the airfryer - I‚Äôd avoid using a frypan as it‚Äôll make it kind of soggyüôÉ I always use VF butter, but maple syrup or another honey substitute can be used to be fully VFü§ó
recipeIngredient: 2x 350g blocks of extra firm or pressed tofu

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 425F
Fully dry 2x 350g blocks of extra firm or pressed tofu with paper towel, then crumble into small pieces.

Season and toss the tofu with 1 Tbsp paprika, 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp onion powder and 1/2 tsp pepper, then spread evenly on a parchment lined baking sheet and bake at 425F for 20mins or until golden, and let cool.
Melt 1/4 cup butter with 1/4 cup honey and 1 Tbsp chili crisp, then toss with the cooled tofu. Serve with rice, on salads or in wraps!

schema.name: Tomato and Burrata Tortilla Quiche
schema.description: This quick and easy tortilla quiche is the perfect recipe for an easy weekday breakfast. Packed full of protein AND big flavor, this has been a regular in my breakfast rotation. Adding burrata and perfectly ripe tomatoes takes it to a whole new level.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all of your ingredients inside a tortilla shell, pressed into a pan or baking dish.
Bake at 350F for 15-20 mins until eggs are just set.
Enjoy!

schema.name: SPINACH & FETA CHICKEN FRITTERS
schema.description: crispy edges, salty feta, and an actually satisfying amount of protein. so easy, so meal-prepable, and so good with grilled veggies (hi broccolini) or atop your favorite green salad.

recipeInstructions.text: combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix gently with hands, until thoroughly combined. Shape turkey mixture into 12 mini burgers; set aside
In a large pan or skillet, heat 1 tsp. avocado oil on medium high heat for about 1 minute; add mini burgers and cook on each side until no longer pink in the center.
Add olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey and spices to a baking dish.
Arrange the tomatoes and mozzarella evenly.
Cover with the puff pastry, sealing the edges.
Brush with beaten egg.
Bake for 25 minutes at 375¬∞F until golden.
Carefully flip, top with burrata and finish with pesto before serving.

schema.name: Burrata Caprese Sandwich

schema.description: Poucos ingredientes, m√°xima eleg√¢ncia. O cl√°ssico italiano que prova que simplicidade tamb√©m pode ser luxo: Sandu√≠che Caprese com Burrata.

recipeInstructions.text: Corte o p√£o e regue levemente com azeite.
Abra a burrata e espalhe generosamente no p√£o.
Acrescente os tomates, o manjeric√£o e tempere com sal e pimenta.

schema.name: Banana Pancakes
schema.description: A healthier banana pancake recipe from the Healthier Snack Series, Episode 10.
recipeIngredient: a tiny bit of coconut oil

recipeInstructions.text: Blend 1 banana, 1 egg, 1/4 cup oats, 1/4 tsp baking powder, pinch salt, dash of cinnamon.
Preheat frying pan on medium heat, add a tiny bit of coconut oil.
Pour 1/4 cup batter into the pan, even out a little.
Wait until bubbles start to appear.
Loosen sides, then if ready to flip, go for it and cook for further 30 seconds or so.
Repeat with remaining batter.
Stack high, add toppings of desire and enjoy!

schema.name: Creamy Chicken Ramen
schema.keywords: ramen, somen, japanese, japanesefood, recipe, ramenrecipe, simplerecipes, healthy, health, healthyfood, healthyrecipes, cooking, lunch, dinner, dinnerideas, lunchideas, recipeoftheday, recipes, chicken, chickenrecipes, chickenramen, vitalfarmsvff, vitalfarms, f52grams, tastemademedoit

2. In your bowl add a raw egg, mayo, chili crisp, black bean paste, sesame oil and whisk until combined
3. Top wit your cooked noodles and egg as well as your chicken, nori, and more chili crisp oil and sesame seeds!

schema.name: BURRATA PEACH AND HOT HONEY SALAD
schema.keywords: Summer Salad Recipes,Easy Dinner Ideas,Peach Salad Recipes,Burrata Cheese Salad,Hot Honey Recipes,Summer Recipes,Easy Lunch Ideas,Quick and Healthy Meals,Fresh Peach Recipes,Dinner Ideas for One,Lunch Ideas for Two,Salad Recipes for Summer,Healthy Food Recipes,Foodie Recipes,Yummy Recipes,Delicious Salad Recipes,Peach and Burrata Salad,Summer Food,Summer Dinner Ideas,Healthy Recipes,Fresh Salad Recipes,christmas,christmasfood,Recipe,easyrecipe,salad
schema.description: Create a mouthwatering summer salad with fresh peaches, creamy burrata cheese, and a drizzle of hot honey. This easy recipe is perfect for a quick and healthy dinner or lunch idea, and can be customized to your taste. With just a few simple ingredients, you can create a refreshing and delicious meal that's sure to impress.

recipeInstructions.text: Dice your peaches into cubes.
Add oil to a pan and cook on medium heat until soft.
In a bowl add rocket, peaches, tomatoes cut in half, prosciutto and burrata.
Drizzle with hot honey and finish with pepitas.

schema.name: Feta & Red Onion Plait
schema.description: Feta & Red Onion Plait: If you fancy a roast dinner but want to make something a little bit different...this one has all of the Sunday feels... Crumbled feta, breadcrumbs, spinach, red onion, a few herbs, a little bit of milk, all mixed with beaten egg and wrapped up in a golden pastry plait. This is so easy, it's full of flavour and there's something so wholesome about plaiting a pastry pie! We had this with mash, which was incredible, but if you can be bothered, try having it with roasties for a Sunday lunch that I swear is as good as a roast dinner!
recipeIngredient: Sheet of ready rolled puff pastry

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a drizzle of oil in a large non-stick pan. Add the red onion and fry on a medium heat for 5 minutes.
Crumble both blocks of feta into a large mixing bowl. Add the fresh breadcrumbs, dried Thyme, chopped fresh spinach, honey, 2 eggs and milk. Season with ground black pepper.
Give it a really good stir, working the milk and the egg through the ingredients until it is all absorbed and everything is thoroughly combined.
Lay the puff pastry out on the worktop.
Place the filling lengthways down the centre of the pastry - leave around a 5cm gap of pastry either side of the filling and around 3cm of pastry either end.
Flatten the filling out a little and make sure it's evenly spread.
Starting in the top left corner cut 1cm diagonal strips into the pastry from the filling outwards.
Tuck the ends of the pastry over the filing. Fold the strips of pastry alternately into the middle crossing over each other.
When all the pastry is folded up and the filling is encased, brush with beaten egg. Bake at 200C for 25-30 mins

schema.name: Herbed Mushroom & Gruy√®re Pastry Plait
schema.keywords: Herbed Mushroom, Gruy√®re Pastry Plait, savory appetizer, vegetarian main, Mushroom, Gruy√®re, Pastry, Plait, Appetizer, Vegetarian
schema.description: Slice and serve warm as a savory appetizer or vegetarian main.

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200¬∞C (400¬∞F). Line a baking tray with parchment paper.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut√© onion until soft and translucent.
Add mushrooms and cook until moisture evaporates and mushrooms are golden.
Stir in garlic, thyme, rosemary, salt, and pepper. Cook 1 minute, then remove from heat.
Allow mixture to cool slightly, then stir in grated Gruy√®re.
Roll out puff pastry onto the prepared baking tray. Spoon mushroom mixture down the center lengthwise.
Cut diagonal strips on both sides of the pastry and fold alternately over the filling to form a plait.
Brush pastry with beaten egg.
Bake for 25‚Äì30 minutes until puffed and deeply golden.
Sprinkle with extra Gruy√®re and garnish with thyme if desired.
Slice and serve warm as a savory appetizer or vegetarian main.

schema.name: CHILI GARLIC KOREAN FRIED CHICKEN TACOS (NEEDS RE-SCRAPE)
Golden Cranberry‚ÄìBalsamic Flatbread with Goat Cheese, Mozzarella & Fresh Herbs
schema.description: Golden Cranberry‚ÄìBalsamic Flatbread with Goat Cheese, Mozzarella & Fresh Herbs
recipeIngredient: 1/3 cup cranberry sauce or cranberry preserves
Fresh cracked black pepper, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 400¬∞F (205¬∞C). Line a baking tray with parchment paper.
Place the flatbread on the prepared tray and brush lightly with olive oil.
In a small bowl, mix the cranberry sauce and balsamic glaze. Spread evenly over the flatbread.
Sprinkle mozzarella cheese across the surface.
Add the red onion slices and crumble goat cheese on top.
Sprinkle with rosemary, thyme, and cracked black pepper.
Bake for 10‚Äì12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the edges are golden and crisp.
Remove from oven, let cool slightly, slice, and serve warm.

schema.name: TORSADES feuillet√©es
schema.description: TORSADES feuillet√©es pour vos ap√©ros de No√´l‚ú®üéÑ

recipeInstructions.text: Pr√©parer la farce en m√©langeant le fromage frais avec le bacon pr√©alablement grill√©s et mix√©s, la mozzarella r√¢p√©e, les tomates s√©ch√©es coup√©es en petits morceaux, le cheddar r√¢p√© et le persil cisel√©.

√âtaler la pr√©paration sur une pate feuillet√©e et la replier sur elle m√™me. √Ä l‚Äôaide d‚Äôun couteau, faire des bandes dans la p√¢te et tourner les sur elles-m√™me pour former des torsades. Badigeonner un peu de jaune d‚Äôoeuf sur le dessus.
Cuisson 20min √† 180 degr√©s.
M√©langer le beurre fondu avec la gousse d‚Äôail √©minc√©e, du persil, une pointe de sel et badigeonner les tordades avec le m√©lange.

schema.name: Sticky gochujang tofu wraps
schema.keywords: Sticky gochujang tofu wraps, vegan, plantbased, tofu, recipe, veganrecipe, gochujang, tofu, wraps
schema.description:
New fave lunch unlocked ‚ú® Full recipe below!

Sticky gochujang tofu wraps üåØ
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp vegan chicken stock powder (can sub veg stock)

recipeInstructions.text: Tear the tofu into chunks and add to a bowl with corn flour and stock powder. Toss until well-coated
Place a frying pan over medium-high heat on the stove and drizzle with olive oil. Once hot, add the tofu chunks and fry for 10 minutes, tossing occasionally, until lightly golden
Whilst the tofu fries, make the gochujang glaze by adding all of the glaze ingredients to a bowl and whisking together until smooth
Reduce the heat on the stove to low-medium, and add the gochujang glaze to the tofu. Toss well, until tofu is well-coated, then continue to fry for a further 5 minutes
Thinly slice the cucumbers and add them to a bowl and toss with sesame seeds and rice wine vinegar
Thinly slice the green cabbage
Add tahini, maple/rice malt syrup, soy sauce and water to a small bowl and mix until smooth, adding more water if needed
Remove the tofu from the heat. Warm the wraps/flatbreads, and then assemble. Start with tahini sauce, followed by cabbage, cucumbers, tofu, more tahini sauce and sesame seeds
Enjoy!

schema.name: Fig & caramelized hot honey grilled cheese
schema.description: It‚Äôs cheesy, sweet & salty EVERYTHING you could possibly want in a GRILLED CHEESE. This Fig & caramelized hot honey grilled cheese passes all the grilled cheese tests for me! Made with 2 different types of cheeses- Gruyere & Havarti & coated in a cinnamon sugar butter mixture. It is a total treat for your tastebuds
recipeIngredient: 1 small red or white onion sliced
2 slices of sourdough bread or bread of choice
2 tbsp softened butter mixed with cinnamon & sugar

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet on medium heat pour in the avocado oil about 2-3 tbsp. Put the onions in with a pinch of salt & turn to medium-low. You want the onions to cook low & slow here so they release their natural sugars.
Add a splash of water if the pan seems too try & stir every few minutes. Once the onions are soft about 10 minutes pour in 1 tbsp balsamic vinegar. Mix for a couple of min then turn off heat.

Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter opposite sides of bread then flip over to spread on the fig jam. Add the shredded cheese, caramelized onions, figs, thyme, sliced havarti, sea salt, hot honey & balsamic glaze. Carefully close the sandwich & transfer to a skillet on medium heat.

Press bread down with the back of the pan & cook until golden then flip & cook the other side making sure the outer bread doesn‚Äôt burn. Transfer to the oven for 5 min to make sure it‚Äôs all cheesy. Slice in half & enjoy by itself or with your fave fall soup!
Mix everything together to get a fluffy dough, then cook it in a pan.

schema.name: Butadon (Japanese-Style Pork Bowl)
schema.description: This Butadon recipe aka Japanese-Style Pork Rice Bowl is one of my favorite comfort foods.
recipeIngredient: 400 g pork belly slices (sliced into 1cm thick strips)

recipeInstructions.text: Place a skillet or frying pan on medium/high heat. Add in the pork belly and sear for a few minutes on each side until golden and slightly browned. Then remove from the pan and set aside.
Meanwhile, prepare your Butadon sauce by adding soy sauce, sake, mirin, honey and minced garlic to a bowl. Stir and set aside.
In the same pan that your pork belly was cooked in, add in the soy sauce mixture and place on medium heat. Leave to simmer for a few minutes or until thickened into a glossy sauce.
Once thickened, add back in your pork belly and stir thoroughly so that the sauce coats every side of the pork belly pieces.
Divide your piping hot, cooked short-grain rice between two bowls, then top with your cooked pork belly.
Top the Butadon with an egg yolk and finely sliced chives. I really hope you enjoy the recipe!

schema.name: Butternut Squash, Sage & Ricotta Tart
recipeIngredient: A few sage leaves (fresh or fried)

recipeInstructions.text: Roast the squash: Toss diced butternut with olive oil, salt, pepper, and thyme. Roast at 200¬∞C (400¬∞F) for 25 minutes or until golden and soft.
Cook the onions: In a pan, saut√© the sliced onion in a little oil until caramelized and sweet (about 10 min).
Make the crust: Rub butter into flour and salt until crumbly. Add egg yolk and water. Roll out and line a tart tin. Prick with a fork and bake blind at 180¬∞C (350¬∞F) for 10 min.
Prepare the filling: In a bowl, mix ricotta, egg, salt, pepper, and half the feta. Stir in roasted squash and onions gently.
Assemble: Spoon filling into the baked crust, top with the remaining feta and sage leaves.
Bake: Bake at 180¬∞C (350¬∞F) for 25‚Äì30 minutes until golden and set.

schema.name: Cheesy sweet chilli chicken flatbreads (NEEDS RE-SCRAPE)
Air Fryer Apple Pie Cottage Cheese Toast
schema.keywords: Air Fryer Apple Pie Toast, high protein apple toast
schema.description: This Air Fryer Apple Pie Cottage Cheese Toast is a delicious healthy snack or breakfast for fall.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread cottage cheese on bread. Top with apples. Sprinkle cinnamon and drizzle over honey.
Air fry toast for 6 minutes at 400 degrees or bake at 400 degrees in your oven for about 10 minutes on a lined sheet pan.
Once toast is done cooking top with mint and bee pollen.

schema.name: Brie & Blueberry Hot Honey Grilled Cheese
schema.description: She‚Äôs backkkkk!! A summer favorite from last year ü´† Trust me on this... the best grilled cheese you will ever have! Literally inhaled every single bite-the combination of the creamy & nutty Brie cheese, fresh picked juicy blueberries & hot honey is just the best flavor explosion ever. On repeat from now on üíô
recipeIngredient: 1-2 tbsp honey depending on how sweet your berries are
Thinly sliced brie cheese to cover the bread

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredients for the blueberry compote to a saucepot & let it come to a boil. Once boiling turn down to a simmer & let thicken stirring occasionally so you don‚Äôt burn the blueberries.
Butter both sides of the bread & turn over to spread a layer of the blueberry compote to both sides. You can also use your favorite blueberry jam if desired but the compote is next level!
Add slices of brie to both slides of bread, then press in a handful of fresh blueberries, basil leaves, drizzle of hot honey, balsamic glaze & flaky sea salt.
Press both sides of bread together & cook on a pan on medium heat until both sides are golden about 2-3 minutes each.
Transfer the grilled cheese to the oven at 350 degrees for about 5 minutes to achieve even more crispness.
Drizzle with more hot honey & flaky sea salt. Enjoy!!

schema.name: HIGH PROTEIN CHILLI CHEESE TOASTS
schema.description: If you need a quick healthy high protein toast idea you have got to try these chilli cheese cottage cheese toasts. Inspired by a very popular Indian street food. So addictive and make the best quick breakfast or lunch or even a snack.
recipeIngredient: 2 tbsp cottage cheese (full fat or low)
1 tbsp fresh chopped coriander (or use parsley)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the cottage cheese with cheddar, onion, pepper, coriander, chilli and season with a crack of black pepper and salt.
Top onto your bread of choice.
Airfry at 200c for 8-10 minutes or bake in the oven on the fan and grill setting at 200c for 10-12 minutes.

schema.name: Crispy Chicken Caesar Sliders
recipeIngredient: 2 lb boneless chicken breast cut into approx 3 inch pieces , halved lengthwise and pounded
2 tbsp Chosen foods avocado oil + more for  frying
2 tbsp butter , to toast the buns

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken with salt pepper garlic powder, smoked paprika powder on both sides. Drizzle oil on top and coat the chicken with oil on both sides.
Prepare dry batter: In a bowl add all purpose flour, salt , pepper, garlic powder, smoked paprika powder, mix and set aside.
Prepare wet batter: In a bowl crack an egg, add water whisk until combined.
Prepare breadcrumbs: In another bowl add breadcrumbs and dried parsley mix and set aside.
Coat the chicken in dry batter then in wet batter repeat the process by coating in  dry batter followed by the wet batter. Lastly coat the chicken in breadcrumbs making sure it‚Äôs evenly coated.
Fry the chicken: Heat oil in a pan until it reaches 360 F. Fry chicken in batches for 3-5 min or until the internal temp reaches 165 F.
Prepare caesar dressing: In a bowl add lettuce, drizzle chosen foods Caesar dressing, Grated Parmesan cheese on top and mix to combine.
Prepare garlic aioli: In a bowl mix mayonnaise , minced garlic, salt , pepper, garlic powder, lemon juice and parsley.
Toast slider buns , Assemble the buns by applying garlic aioli on the bottom bun, place chicken on top, add Caesar salad on top, close the bun and serve

schema.name: Cheesy Pesto Tomato Puffs
schema.keywords: Cheesy Pesto Tomato Puffs, puff pastry recipe, easy appetizer, party snacks, vegetarian snack, basil pesto recipe, mozzarella puffs, tomato pastry bites, quick snack recipe, baked puff pastry, savory pastry, cheese and tomato bites, simple party food, homemade pastry puffs, crispy puff pastry
schema.description: Delightfully flaky puff pastry meets a burst of herby pesto, gooey mozzarella, and sweet, juicy tomato in these irresistible little parcels. Perfect for an afternoon snack, a party appetizer, or a quick bite when you need something comforting yet impressive, these puffs are surprisingly easy to make. The layers of pastry fold around the fillings, creating a fun, almost origami-like presentation that‚Äôs as satisfying to assemble as it is to eat. Topped with crispy sesame seeds, each bite is golden, crunchy, and full of flavour. Serve warm straight from the oven, and watch them disappear in minutes!
recipeIngredient: 340 g puff pastry (12 oz, ready-rolled sheet)
Crispy sesame salt or sesame seeds (for garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oven to 200¬∞C (400¬∞F) and line a baking tray with parchment. Unroll the puff pastry into a rectangle, about 24 x 36cm (roughly 9¬Ω x 14 inches), and cut it into six equal squares.

Take one square and picture it as four smaller ones. To make the folds, cut from the very centre straight out to the middle of one side ‚Äî almost like you‚Äôre separating two of those imagined little squares. Leave one quarter empty, spread pesto on the next, sprinkle mozzarella on another, and place a slice of tomato on the last. Start folding by bringing the empty corner over the pesto, then fold both layers over the cheese, and finally all three over the tomato, creating one neat layered puff. Repeat with the rest.

Arrange the parcels on the tray. Beat the egg yolk with milk, brush generously over the tops, and finish with a scatter of sesame salt or seeds. Bake for around 15 minutes, until the pastry is beautifully golden and puffed.
Let them cool just enough to handle, then bite in ‚Äî crisp layers of pastry with melty cheese, fragrant pesto, and juicy tomato all in one mouthful.

schema.name: Pancakes spaghettis
schema.description: Recette gourmande ü§§. On a revisit√© les pancakes, petit d√©jeuner que tout le monde raffole, en spaghettis ! Une recette super gourmande et originale, et surtout tr√®s facile et amusante √† faire. √Ä d√©guster avec une poign√©e de fruits et un filet de chocolat. üç´

recipeInstructions.text: Ajoute dans un bol : le beurre fondu avec le sucre en poudre et l'extrait de vanille. Fouette le tout.
Casse un ≈ìuf et incorpore la farine avec la levure. Fouette jusqu'√† obtenir une p√¢te bien lisse.
Verse la p√¢te √† pancakes sous forme de filets. Fais-les cuire 1 minute de chaque c√¥t√©. Renouvelle l'op√©ration jusqu'√† ne plus avoir de p√¢te.
Place les pancakes spaghetti dans une assiette creuse.
Ajoute des rondelles de banane, de fraises et un filet de chocolat fondu.
C‚Äôest pr√™t, r√©gale-toi imm√©diatement avant qu‚Äôil n‚Äôen reste plus !

schema.name: Turkey and Cheese Sandwich
schema.description: Turkey and Cheese Sandwich with Caramelized Onions, Fig Jam, and White Cheddar Cheese
recipeIngredient: 1 lb Deli Sliced Smoked Turkey (I prefer to ask for it to be sliced very thin from the deli counter)
1/2 lb Deli Sliced White Cheddar Cheese
2 tbsp Fig Jam (This is very similar to Fig Butter. )
2-3 tbsp Mayonnaise (How much you use is your preference, but you want to use enough to form a thin layer on the bottom half of the bread and also the top layer of the bread.)

recipeInstructions.text: Caramelized Onions - I use 1 very large yellow onion, or two medium yellow onions. I slice them then I add them to a pan with about 1 tbsp melted butter and 1 tbsp olive oil. I then cook them for about 40 minutes on low heat, mixing them frequently so that they do not burn.
Preheat your Oven to 350F
Slice your bread - If you are using baguette or Italian Bread, you will want to slide it down the whole long side and then open it up and try to push it down so that it lays flat.
Add half of your Mayonnaise - Add a thin layer of mayonnaise to the bottom side of the bread.
Add your Turkey - Cover the mayonnaise with sliced turkey. I like to fold each slice in half and then pile it on, overlapping each slice slightly.
Add your Cheese - Top each slice of the turkey with a slice of cheese, letting it overlap slightly so that each area has about 1.5-2 slices each.
Add your Onions - distribute the caramelized onions equally on top of the cheese
Add the rest of your Mayonnaise - Add a thin layer of mayonnaise and fig jam on the other side of the bread.
Heat the Sandwich -  Wrap up the sandwich in tin foil and bake it in an oven at 350F for 20 minutes
Let the sandwich cool slightly and then remove it from the aluminum foil. Slice into pieces and serve.

schema.name: Creamy Mushroom Udon
schema.description: simple & comforting recipes
recipeIngredient: Salt, Pepper, Chicken seasoning powder, Sugar

recipeInstructions.text: First, saut√© the mushrooms until browned then add butter, soy sauce, onion & garlic. Saut√© until its fragrant then add the milk.
Add salt, pepper, chicken seasoning powder & sugar to your liking then add cornstarch slurry and cook until the sauce thickens.
Lastly, add in the udon noodles and mix until every noodles is coated with the sauce ! Add an egg yolk on top to make the udon more creamy but it‚Äôs definitely optional, Enjoy <3

schema.name: Parmesan Tomato Melt
schema.keywords: borosil,borosilandyou,fusionrecipes,recipe,snack,quickrecipe,fusionflavors,sandwichlove,tomatosandwich,easyrecipe,comfortfood,snackideas,cookwithborosil,borosilkitchen,borosilcookware,parmesan-cheese,cheesy sandwich,weekend cooking,party snacks,trending recipes,quick snacks,fusion food,cafe style
schema.description: Sandwiches that make you drool>>>. This is not just a sandwich; this is the star of the table. This Parmesan Tomato Melt is crispy, cheesy, juicy, and everything you didn‚Äôt know your snack time needed. Make a big batch because trust us, one is never enough when friends are around.
recipeIngredient: 2 large ripe tomatoes, cut into 1‚ÅÑ2-inch slices

recipeInstructions.text: Parmesan Tomato Melt
1. Mix panko, parmesan, herbs, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
2. Dip tomato slices into the flour slurry, then press into the breadcrumb mixture to coat well.
3. Heat oil in a skillet. Shallow-fry the tomatoes for 2‚Äì3 minutes per side, until golden and crisp. Drain on paper towel.
Chili Oil Onions
1. Heat chili oil in a pan.
2. Add sliced onions and cook on low heat for about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until caramelized.
3. Add a pinch of salt and continue cooking until soft and sticky.

schema.name: Tofu Flatbreads
schema.description: Need a sneaky way to get more protein in? Try these silken tofu flatbreads. They‚Äôre fluffy, garlicky, and ridiculously easy to throw together.
recipeIngredient: 1 red or green chilli, finely diced
Small handful coriander leaves, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, mash the tofu with salt, coriander, chilli, nooch, and cumin | Add the flour + 3 tbsp water | Mix until just combined, then knead on a floured surface until smooth | Rest 10 mins | Roll into balls, then flatten into rounds with a rolling pin
Heat a little oil in a pan | Fry each flatbread 3‚Äì4 mins until golden and puffed
Melt butter in a small pan | Add garlic, sizzle 1‚Äì2 mins, then stir in coriander
Brush the garlic butter over the warm flatbreads and serve straight away üëå

schema.name: Achari Mushroom Melt
schema.keywords: achari,mushroom,sandwich,healthy,quickrecipes,weekendcooking,easy recipes,healthy recipe,trending recipes,mushroom with achari twist,cheese pull,achari flavour
schema.description: The tangy masala gives it that Indian kick, the creamy mayo makes it feel fancy, and the mushrooms make it all come together like a dream. It‚Äôs that kind of food that makes your kitchen smell like a treat and your mood instantly better. Make it once and it‚Äôll become your new obsession!
recipeIngredient: Mozzarella cheese ‚Äì as needed (shredded or slices)

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all ingredients together until smooth and creamy. (Achari Garlic Mayo Spread)
Combine all ingredients in a small saucepan, bring to a gentle simmer, then cool and let the onions pickle for at least 15‚Äì20 minutes. (Pickled Onions)
Prepare the achari mushrooms by saut√©ing all ingredients as listed until mushrooms are cooked and coated with the masala.
Toast the sourdough bread slices with butter, a sprinkle of achari masala, and chopped coriander.
Spread a generous layer of achari garlic mayo on each toasted slice.
Layer one slice with saut√©ed mushrooms, pickled onions, and mozzarella cheese.
Close with the other slice, grill or toast until the cheese melts.
Serve hot with extra mayo dip or a side salad.

schema.name: BROCCOLI BREAD WITH SMOKED SALMON
schema.description: Need a quick idea to treat yourself without any stress? ‚¨áÔ∏è Here‚Äôs the magic recipe: only 4 ingredients, zero fuss, 100% pleasure! Perfect as a snack for aperitivo or paired with a fresh green salad.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons dry yeast (supermarket yeast or instant yeast)
Black sesame or poppy seeds to sprinkle on top of the salmon

schema.name: High Protein Grilled Cheese Breakfast Burritos
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp salt, 1 tsp onion powder, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1 tsp sage, 1 tsp thyme, 2 tsp smoked paprika
14 eggs whisked with 1 tsp salt + 200 g egg whites
10 warm tortillas (Simson‚Äôs Pantry Large Low Carb Tortillas)
20 g light grated cheese per burrito

recipeInstructions.text: Take a burrito out of the freezer, remove foil and microwave for about 2 minutes (this thaws it through the middle)
Then air-fry or bake at 190 ¬∞C (375 ¬∞F) for 5 - 8 minutes depending on your appliance.
You can also skip that and just heat it in a pan on low heat turning every minute or so for roughly 5 minutes.

schema.name: Protein-Packed Green Goddess Chicken Smash
schema.description:
If you need a high-protein, fresh-but-satisfying meal that works for lunches, easy dinners or meal prep - this one is it.
Creamy, crunchy, herby, and seriously filling.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, add the shredded chicken, avocado and soft-boiled eggs. Lightly smash together with a fork.
Add the Greek yoghurt, mayo, Dijon mustard and olive oil. Mix until creamy.
Fold through the red onion, pickles and chives.
Season generously with salt and pepper. Taste and adjust as needed.
Spoon into pita pockets or scoop into crisp romaine lettuce leaves.

schema.name: Stanley Tucci Pasta E Fagioli Soup
schema.description: The viral Stanley Tucci Pasta E Fagioli Soup feels like a cozy sweater!üî•üç≤ü•ï It is beauty, it is grace. It scores a solid 9/10 in the soup stratosphere. I gave it a few minor plot twists‚Äî I prefer leeks over celery. I prefer chickpeas over cannellini beans; I love a broth that‚Äôs rich and a thick soup base. I hope you enjoy this recipe as much we did, grab the recipe deets below!üëáüèº
recipeIngredient: 6 garlic cloves, finely diced or pressed
6-7 cups bone broth or beef broth or veggie broth
24 oz can tomato polpa or ground tomatoes
1 15 oz can chickpeas or cannellini beans
1 cup tightly packed spinach or kale (fresh or frozen)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a large stock pot over medium/high heat and add:, onions, carrots, leeks and sea salt. Stir until softened for ~3 mins, then hit it with the garlic and stir.
Add the basil, oregano, thyme, rosemary and paprika and stir again.
Next, add the ground meat and stir until slightly browned.
Add the tomato paste, broth, ground tomatoes, Parmesan rind and stir.
Then we‚Äôll add the chickpeas or cannellini beans, the dry pasta and let everything simmer away for 20 mins.
Add greens (spinach or kale), squeeze of lemon and shredded Parmesan.
Serve as is or with thick, crusty bread. I‚Äôd keep shredded Parmesan on the side! üòâ

schema.name: Maple Soy Air Fryer Chicken Thighs
schema.keywords: Maple Soy Air Fryer Chicken Thighs, sticky, sweet, spicy
schema.description: Sticky, sweet, and a little spicy Maple Soy Air Fryer Chicken Thighs for dinner tonight!

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl add chicken thighs and season with  soy sauce, maple syrup, lemon zest, garlic powder, and smoked paprika, coat well.
Preheat the air fryer to 400¬∞F. Place thighs in a single layer and cook for 15 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden and cooked through (165¬∞F internal temp).
Make glaze: In a saucepan, melt butter. Add garlic and cook until fragrant. Stir in maple syrup, soy, vinegar, and chili. Simmer for 3‚Äì4 minutes. Stir in slurry and cook until sticky and glossy.
Baste & finish: Add cooked chicken thighs to the glaze, toss to coat.
Serve: Drizzle extra glaze over the chicken serve over rice and veggies and enjoy!

schema.name: HONEY CHILLI BEEF PAPPARDELLE
recipeIngredient: Seasoning: 1 tsp onion & garlic granules, paprika, salt n pepper, oregano

recipeInstructions.text: fry your onion off until softened, round about 10 mins then add your mince and cook until browned then add your seasoning
add your tomato puree and chilli oil (this is quite spicy so lower the amount if you don‚Äôt like it too hot) then add your honey, stock & cream and allow to simmer for 15 mins
stick your pasta on to cook as per instructions and when the pasta is almost cooked add 50ml of pasta water to your pan
once the pasta is cooked transfer to the pan, give it a good stir to combined, top with red chilli flakes and serve

schema.name: Sheet-Pan Chicken Fajitas with Roasted Garlic Chipotle Sauce
schema.keywords: Sheet-Pan, Chicken, Fajitas, Roasted Garlic, Chipotle Sauce
schema.description: Sheet-Pan Chicken Fajitas with Roasted Garlic Chipotle Sauce üî• All the flavor, one pan‚Ä¶ juicy spiced chicken loaded with garlicky goodness üßÑ
recipeIngredient: 2 lb (0.8 kg) boneless skinless chicken thighs, sliced
1/2 each of a red, yellow, orange and green bell pepper, sliced
1 head of garlic, top 1/4 sliced off
1 tbsp oil of choice (for roasted garlic)

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced chicken to a bowl with mayo, avocado oil, honey, lime juice, garlic, and all chicken seasonings. Toss until everything is coated. Marinate for at least a few mins, or up to overnight. Longer = better flavor.
Preheat oven to 425¬∞F (220¬∞C). Drizzle the garlic head with oil and salt, wrap it in foil like a little flavor gift, and place on a tray. Roast for 45‚Äì60 minutes, until soft & golden.

Add all sliced veggies to a large sheet pan. Drizzle with avocado oil, sprinkle with veggie seasonings, and toss to coat. Add the marinated chicken directly onto the pan with the veggies. Toss everything together so it plays nice. Bake for 20‚Äì25 minutes, until the chicken is fully cooked, lightly charred, and the veggies are tender.
Once the garlic is cool, squeeze the roasted cloves into a blender or food processor. Add sour cream, mayo, chipotle peppers, honey, and lime juice. Blend until smooth.
Spoon pan juices back over the chicken. Top with cilantro, extra lime, and dollops of the chipotle sauce. I love turning this into wraps. Load up tortillas and crisp them in a buttered pan.

schema.name: Roasted garlic potatoes au gratin
schema.description: Roasted garlic potatoes au gratin ‚ú®ü•î
recipeIngredient: 7 oz white sharp cheddar, shredded (or Parmesan)
2 tsp garlic powder (add more or less for all seasonings)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 400¬∞F (200¬∞C)

Slice the top off the garlic bulb, drizzle with olive oil, season with salt & pepper, wrap in foil, and roast for about 60 minutes until soft and caramelized. Once cooled, squeeze the roasted garlic out of the cloves and mash it with a fork. Set aside.
Wash and peel the potatoes. Slice them thinly (about 1/8-inch thick). Place the sliced potatoes in a bowl of cold water to prevent browning.
In a saucepan on medium low heat half & half with fresh thyme, rosemary, bay leaves, Parmesan rind, and salt. Allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes. Strain and set aside.
In a saucepan, on medium heat add olive oil, butter, and onions. Cook until translucent about 4-5 minutes.
Add flour and whisk until flour is cooked.
Pour in the half and half, stirring to combine. Simmer for 4 minutes stirring frequently until thickened.
Add garlic powder , onion powder, dried thyme, paprika, and toasted garlic. Mix until combined.
Stir in the cheeses until melted and smooth. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with butter or cooking spray. Layer the sliced potatoes evenly in the dish, slightly overlapping. Pour the creamy sauce over the potatoes and spread to make sure it evenly coated
Cover the dish tightly with aluminum foil and bake 325F (165C) for 90-minutes, or until the potatoes are tender when pierced with a fork.
Remove the foil and bake uncovered on broil for 3-5 minutes or until top is golden and bubbly

schema.name: Sticky Maple & Dijon Sprouts on Garlic Tahini Cream
schema.description: A glossy, sweet-savory sprout dish with a silky nutty base ‚Äî perfect for Instagram plating. Brussels sprouts contain glucosinolates, sulphur-rich plant compounds that break down into active metabolites (like sulforaphane) when chopped or chewed. These compounds support liver detoxification pathways, have anti-inflammatory effects, and may help regulate cellular defence mechanisms. Cutting the sprouts in half increases surface area, boosting this conversion.
recipeIngredient: 1 small garlic clove, grated very finely
Optional: ¬Ω tsp honey or maple if you want a softer edge
Toasted sesame seeds or crushed pistachios

recipeInstructions.text: Toss the halved sprouts with olive oil, salt and pepper. Roast cut-side down at 200¬∞C (fan) for 18‚Äì22 mins until golden and crisp.
Whisk Dijon, maple, vinegar and grated garlic. Pour over the hot sprouts, toss, and roast for another 5 mins to caramelise.
Mix tahini, garlic and lemon. Add cold water gradually until smooth and pourable. Season to taste.
Swoosh garlic tahini on the plate, pile on the sticky sprouts, and finish with sesame seeds or pistachios, olive oil, and black pepper.

schema.name: Viral Carrot Cake Baked Oats
schema.description: 35 MILLION views and hundreds of reviews later‚Ä¶ my viral carrot cake baked oats recipe isn‚Äôt just my most popular recipe of 2024, it‚Äôs my most popular recipe EVER! üòçü•ï
recipeIngredient: ~30g vanilla plant protein powder OR 2 tbsp wholemeal plain flour*

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180 degrees Celsius conventional (~350 degrees Fahrenheit).

In a greased oven safe container/baking tray (15-20x15-20), combine banana, mashing this like so, followed by the rolled oats, vanilla protein powder OR wholemeal plain flour*, cinnamon, baking powder, grated carrot, nuts, honey, and milk. Mix until well combined.
Place in the oven and cook for about ~35-40 minutes, or until golden and firm to touch.
Remove from oven and allow oats to cool in the container/ tray. Loosen the edges with a knife and then combine and add the yoghurt ‚Äòtopping‚Äô. Refrigerate and serve the next day.

Upon serving, cut into 4/6 servings*. If serving warm the next day - reheat a slice in the microwave for ~1 minute (yes the yoghurt layer actually tastes great slightly heated also, or you can add this the next day, after heating if you would prefer), or serve as is/cold.
If opting for the no protein powder option, serve with an additional heaped tbsp or two of yoghurt (per serve/slice), to ensure a similar protein serve to option A.

schema.name: PIZZA CHRISTMAS TREE
schema.description: PIZZA CHRISTMAS TREE üçïüéÑ

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the pizza dough into equal sized squares.
Place a mozzarella ball in the center of each square.
Seal and roll into round dough balls.
Arrange the balls in a Christmas tree shape on a baking tray.
Brush with beaten egg.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and drizzle with parsley oil.
Bake for 20 minutes at 375¬∞F until golden.

schema.name: Blueberry Goat Cheese Pastry Twists
schema.description: When an appetizer looks & SOUNDS this good but only takes under 20 min to prepare ü§´ü´ê Blueberry Goat Cheese Pastry Twists! A perfect sweet & savory combination. The best part is that CRUNCH topped with a lemon, thyme sugar mixture. A must for any get-together or just to enjoy by yourself! Both frozen blueberries & fresh works great in this as well:)
recipeIngredient: 1 puff pastry defrosted overnight in fridge

recipeInstructions.text: Make the blueberry compote first by adding the frozen blueberries, cinnamon stick, maple syrup, lemon juice & maple syrup to a small pot. Stir together & place on medium heat until it starts bubbling. Lower heat to a simmer & keep mixing & cook for 15-20 minutes until thickened. Take off heat & let cool completely pouring into a container.
Take the defrosted puff pastry out of the fridge & place a piece of parchment paper with flour on top.

Roll out the puff pastry into a big rectangle as much as you can. Spread the cooled blueberry compote evenly leaving about a 1 inch border. Crumble all of the goat cheese & sprinkle on top of the blueberries.

Take an offset spatula & spread the goat cheese into the blueberry mixture. Fold one side of the puff pastry over & press down dealing the edges. Cut into 10-12 slices about 1/2 inch thick. Twist the pastry dough by holding it & twist it in opposite directions.

Place on a baking sheet with parchment paper & repeat for all. Mix the egg & water together then brush it on all over the pastry twists. Sprinkle the raw sugar, lemon zest & thyme on top then bake at 375 degrees for 20-25 min until golden brown & crispy.
Enjoy!

schema.name: Minced Meat & Kashar Cheese Pide
schema.keywords: Minced Meat, Kashar Cheese, Pide, pastalimpus, mincedmeatpide
recipeIngredient: Black pepper, red pepper flakes, salt
Egg yolk + 1 tsp vegetable oil + 1 tsp water (mixed)

recipeInstructions.text: First, prepare the filling and let it cool.

Finely chop the onions and peppers and saut√© them in vegetable oil. Add the minced meat and cook. Once the meat is cooked, add the tomato paste and mix. Add the spices, mix again, then add the diced tomatoes. Cover and cook well over low heat.

Warm the water. Mix all ingredients except the flour and oil in a bowl. First add 3 cups of flour and mix, then add the remaining flour and knead well. Let it rest for 10 minutes, add the vegetable oil, knead again, and let it rise in a warm place.

When the dough doubles in size, divide it into 8 balls. Roll them all out and shape as shown in the video. Brush the edges with the egg yolk‚Äìoil‚Äìwater mixture. Bake in a fully preheated 200¬∞C (392¬∞F) non-fan oven, on the lowest rack, until golden.

schema.name: Chickpea tuna salad sandwich
schema.description: Chickpea tuna salad sandwich to set me straight after the holidays ‚ú® this is the perfect loaded sandwich recipe to reset and refresh, before we get into the new year! Still filling and delicious, but packed with fresh ingredients and flavour!
recipeIngredient: 1 can (15 oz) chickpeas, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: In a mixing bowl, mash the chickpeas with a fork or potato masher until they are partially mashed but still have some texture.

Add diced apple, diced red onion, chopped parsley, Vegan Mayo, Dijon mustard, lemon juice, garlic powder, smoked paprika salt, and pepper. Mix everything together until well combined. Adjust seasoning to taste
Preheat a grill pan or skillet over medium heat. Spread vegan vegan mayonnaise on one side of each slice of sourdough bread.
Place the bread slices, Hellmann‚Äôs Vegan May-sideo down on the grill pan or skillet. Grill for 2-3 minutes, or until golden brown and crispy. Remove from heat.

Take one slice of grilled sourdough and spread a generous amount of the chickpea salad mixture on top. Place another slice of grilled sourdough on top to form a sandwich. Repeat with the remaining bread slices and chickpea salad mixture.
Enjoy!

schema.name: HAM AND CHEESE PUFF PASTRY TARTS
schema.keywords: HAM AND CHEESE PUFF PASTRY TARTS, HostingIdeas, RecipeReels, EasyRecipes, PuffPastry, CooperPartner, Cooper Sharp
schema.description: These HAM AND CHEESE PUFF PASTRY TARTS require just 6 ingredients and are sure to make you a hosting hero. Minimal prep/clean up, maximum deliciousness and Cooper Sharp makes these absolutely decadent. It melts so smoothly (no weird separation or globs here!), to ensure you have perfect pastry every time.
recipeIngredient: 1 sheet of puff pastry, defrosted, rolled out and cut into 8 rectangles
4 thin slices of ham, cut into 4ths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 400-425F (depending on the instructions on your puff pastry).
Thaw and roll out your puff pastry, then cut into 8 rectangles. If you prefer smaller puff pastries, you can cut into 16 and make 8 small ones!
Layer 4 slices of ham into half of the rectangles, leaving about ¬Ω inch all the way around to seal them.
Spread on 1 tsp of mustard over the ham. Top with 2 slices of Cooper Sharp cheese, and then spread on 1 tbsp of fig jam.
Top with another rectangle of puff pastry and seal the edges by crimping them well with a fork. Ensure there are no gaps so your filling stays put while they bake.
Beat an egg and brush over the puff pastry to ensure it gets a glossy, brown finish when baking.
Bake for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and puffed up. Let cool for 5 minutes before serving and then enjoy while the cheese is deliciously melty!

schema.name: Zucchini Wrap
schema.description: No bread, no flour‚Ä¶ this zucchini wrap is SO good- I turned zucchini into a wrap and I‚Äôm obsessed üòç
recipeIngredient: Chilli flakes / pepper dust, to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the zucchini base: Cut zucchini into thin slices. Arrange them on a pan or flat surface, overlapping each other to form a wrap shape.
Season & cook: Sprinkle salt and black pepper. Lightly spray with olive oil. Cook on medium heat until the bottom is light golden.
Flip carefully: Flip using a big flat spatula or with the help of a plate. Cook the other side until golden or lightly crispy. Avoid burning or overcooking.
Add cheese layer: Sprinkle mozzarella evenly over the zucchini wrap.
Prepare & add filling: Mix blanched spinach with feta cheese. Spread over the melted mozzarella.
Top it up: Add grilled tomatoes. Drizzle chilli oil. Dust chilli flakes or pepper to taste.
Wrap & finish: Carefully fold or wrap like an envelope. Sprinkle oregano and parsley.
Enjoy!: Serve hot and enjoy your healthy zucchini wrap ü•í

schema.name: ONE PAN EGG SANDWICH
schema.keywords: egg, one pan meal, recipes, sandwiches, lunch ideas
schema.description: A delicious break, brunch or lunch idea, just cook it in a frying pan on a medium heat and layer it all up, it's so good! One of my favourite reels of 2025 ü•∞
recipeIngredient: Slices of ham fried in butter
Two eggs mixed with some seasoning, salt and pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Cook it in a frying pan on a medium heat and layer it all up.

schema.name: Spicy Kimchi Tofu Bowls
schema.keywords: Spicy, Kimchi, Tofu, Bowls, veganrecipes, easyveganmeals, plantbasedrecipes, kimchi, cucumber, radish, mayo, rice, edamame
schema.description: no. 1 recipe of the year: Spicy Kimchi Tofu Bowls at 2.8 million views
recipeIngredient: 1 block firm or extra-firm tofu, cut or ripped into bite-sized pieces
1 tablespoon kimchi hot sauce or sriracha
1 tablespoon kimchi hot sauce or sriracha

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the tofu in salted water for 5 minutes (instead of pressing). Drain and pat dry.
In a bowl, whisk together the kimchi juice, sesame oil, maple syrup, tamari, dark soy, rice vinegar, and hot sauce. Add the tofu and let it marinate for 5 to 10 minutes.

Heat a thin layer of avocado oil in a pan on medium heat. Remove the tofu from the marinade (reserve the leftover marinade) and cook in a single layer for 3 to 4 minutes on one side until golden, then flip and cook another 2 minutes.
Lower the heat. Whisk the cornstarch into the reserved marinade, then pour into the pan and cook for 1 minute until the sauce thickens and coats the tofu.
For Pickled cucumber and radish: Put everything in a container and let sit for 10-15 minutes or longer.
For Spicy kimchi mayo: Whisk together mayo, chopped kimchi, kimchi hot sauce or sriracha, and zest of 1 lime until creamy and well combined.
Assemble bowls with cooked rice, edamame, pickled cucumber and radish, spicy kimchi mayo, and optional toppings: sesame seeds, scallions, lime wedges.

schema.name: Chilli Peanut Udon w/ Charred Sesame Broccoli
recipeIngredient: 1 tbsp crispy chilli oil, solids only (I use Lao Gan Ma or White Masu)
2 tsp rice wine vinegar (apple cider or white vinegar)
1 bunch tenderstem broccoli, trimmed and halved or quartered lengthwise
2 tsp rice wine vinegar (apple cider or white vinegar)
2 portions of protein of choice, optional - I used baked tofu
2 soft boiled or fried eggs, optional - omit for 100% plant-based recipe

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the sesame seeds | Heat a wide frying pan over medium heat | Add the sesame seeds and toast until deeply golden and aromatic | Tip out and reserve

Char the broccoli | Return the pan to the heat and increase to a high heat | Add the oil and broccoli with a pinch of salt | Leave still until well charred then stir and toss and repeat until more charred and and just tender | Remove the broccoli and add to a bowl, or to save on washing simply allow the pan to cool | Add the soy sauce, vinegar, sesame oil and toasted sesame seeds and stir to combine | Taste and season with salt if needed
Make the sauce | Whisk together the chilli oil (solids), peanut butter, miso, mirin, soy sauce and vinegar until smooth | Loosen with a spoon of hot noodle or tap water if needed
Cook the noodles | Cook the udon in well-salted boiling water until just tender | Drain, reserving a little cooking water
Bring together | Add the hot noodles to the sauce | Toss to coat, loosening with more water if needed | Divide between bowls and top with the charred broccoli and your protein of choice

schema.name: Gochujang Coconut Poached Fish
schema.description: I‚Äôm calling it, this might be the best poached fish recipe yet üëÄ Should I do a Part 5? What flavour combo next? üëá So simple and SO tasty. Such a win for a week night dinner.

recipeInstructions.text: Add garlic and half of the spring onion to pan with oil, cook for a few mins
Then add gochujang and let cook for a few mins before adding coconut milk, stock and fish sauce
Add your salmon fillets, top with lime zest and juice and put on the lid and cook for 10-12 min depending on size of fillets (fish will be flakey once cooked)
Serve with rice and extra veggies!

schema.name: Cheesy Korean Sweet Potato Breakfast Hash

itemListElement.text: Combine spices in a small bowl.
Toss potatoes, onions, garlic, ginger and spice mix with olive oil until evenly coated.
Fold together the cheeses in a separate bowl and reserve.
Spread everything on a sheet pan and roast at 425¬∞F for 20 minutes, turning halfway through.
Sprinkle on cheese mixture and broil another 2 minutes until bubbly and golden.
Cook at 380¬∞F for 12‚Äì15 minutes, shaking basket halfway.
Add cheese mixture, increase to 400¬∞F for 1‚Äì2 minutes until bubbly and golden.
Fry eggs how you like them
Plate the potatoes, top with fried eggs, then garnish with pickled carrots, gochujang, green onion, and aioli if desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the tofu into 8 blocks and boil for 8 minutes, shock with cold water and crumble.
Mix together tofu marinade ingredients and combine with tofu, refrigerate at least 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a large pot on medium, add onions with salt and saut√© for 2 minutes.
Add garlic, tomato paste, chili crisp, spice mix and stir until fragrant, 2 minutes.
Add tofu and cook 10 minutes, stirring frequently.
Fold in tomatoes, use a large spoon to roughly break them apart, simmer covered 10 minutes.
Add remaining vegetables and stock, stir to combine, simmer covered for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Stir in lime juice and serve with chili crisp for drizzling.

schema.name: SLOW ROASTED FETA-DILL-PISTACHIO CRUSTED SALMON WITH CREAMY TZATZIKI
schema.description: Upgraded this EASY weeknight meal that has crunch, salt, tang, & lots of flavor‚Äîadding a crumble & slow roasting keeps the salmon moist & filled with flavor‚Äî the most perfect way to make a whole meal in one!

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 275.

Add the pistachios to a cutting board and begin chopping finely. Add the feta and continue to chop as the ingredients combine. Add the parsley and dill, lemon zest, salt and pepper and continue to chop together to form a uniform mixture of the ingredients.

Add the salmon to a baking sheet, pat the top dry, season with a little salt and pepper then brush the top and sides with the mustard. Add the pistachio and feta mixture to the top. Evenly distribute the mixture, then press lightly with a fork. Drizzle with olive oil then place in the oven to bake for 30-35 minutes, until salmon is cooked through. Optional: place under the broiler for 1-2 minutes to brown the top.

While the salmon roasts, make the tzatziki. First, drain the liquid from the cucumber using a cheesecloth or paper towels. Next, add the yogurt, strained cucumber, dill, mint, olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper to a medium bowl. Mix to combine.
Spread some of the tzatziki, top with the arugula, then top with a piece of the salmon. Finish with the honey and capers.
